 Windlord:
"I see"anwered Windlord who doesn't know what other thing said, at last he said "I guess that  you like come back with your friends, don't you? "
  Azure The Warrior <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote: (Sorry, I dont really understand the question, but I'll try!=)
Starstomp
As I told you, I was a miner in an asteroid mine. Then we were attacked, and 
I finally found myself here. A piece of the base crashed down where 
Termitron and Nightlight found me. I just dont understand how it all 
happened...

>Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

>
>Windlord:
>"I don't know"answered Windlord "So  did you are in a space-base before 
>arrive this planet? "
>   Azure The Warrior <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote: Starstomp looked 
>stunned for a moment, her eyes wide open at what Windlord
>had just said.
>
>Starstomp:
>Past Earth!?!? Whoa... Something's not right... What the heck happened
>during the battle for me to get now and here? Wait, this could be bad... We
>were attacked by a Predacon destroyer and a part of the base, in which I
>was, derived, and then crashed near here. You think the Preds have the
>technology to perform this?
